summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a Civilian Crime Report submitted by A. Lombardino, which suggests a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The email is being forwarded to the FBI as part of standard practice for handling tips related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.

persons.name: A. Lombardino
persons.context: Submitted a Civilian Crime Report suggesting a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the tip mentioned in the forwarded Civilian Crime Report.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the tip mentioned in the forwarded Civilian Crime Report.

connections.description: Both are mentioned together as subjects of a tip from a prisoner in a forwarded Civilian Crime Report.

events.title: Submission of Civilian Crime Report
events.description: A. Lombardino submits a Civilian Crime Report suggesting a prisoner has information about Epstein and Maxwell.

events.title: Email forwarding tip to FBI
events.description: An email is sent forwarding the Civilian Crime Report about Epstein/Maxwell to the FBI per standard practice.

keyFacts: A Civilian Crime Report submitted by A. Lombardino on July 17, 2020, suggests a prisoner has information about Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The report was forwarded to the FBI on August 24, 2020, as part of standard procedure for handling Epstein/Maxwell tips.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing process for collecting and reviewing potential leads related to the Epstein case.
